intro.title: You're Invited! 🎉
intro.body_1: I’m celebrating my 40th birthday, and I’d love for you to join the party! Expect good vibes, great company, varied music, costumes maybe.
intro.body_2: 🔥 We’ll fire up the grill, have some tasty snacks, and of course, drinks will be flowing!
details.body_1: The party kicks off on Saturday at noon and will go on until Sunday, the actualy birthday.
details.body_2: If you’d like to stay overnight, there’s a 20-bed dormitory upstairs — just let me know in advance!
details.body_3: As mentioned, we’ll have a BBQ, so feel free to bring your favorite grillables.
details.body_4: Drinks will be available, but you’re also welcome to bring your own.
details.body_5: Fingers crossed for good weather! If the sun is on our side, we’ll enjoy some outdoor games.
details.body_6: We’ll have a Spotify shared playlist, so everyone can contribute to the music.
details.body_7: Costumes are optional but highly recommended! Get creative and have fun with it.
details.body_8: Cats are welcome, but dogs must stay home—sorry, doggos!
location_body: Location info and a map will go here. 📍
rsvp.body: Let us know who's coming and if you're staying overnight!
